item.description:
The airport commission meeting is held on the second Wednesday of the month at 6pm at the terminal. It is a great way to find out what is going on at the airport and make your voice heard!

The meeting agenda will be made available after it has been posted by the Airport Commission in accordance with the Commonwealth of Massachusetts Open Meeting Law.

NOTE: The May meeting is NOT on the normal second Wednesday this month, it is on the 16th instead, please take note!

The Fitchburg Airport Commission meeting is open to anyone in accordance with the Commonwealth of Massachusetts Open Meeting Law and is not associated with the FPA.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Airport Commission Meeting
